tweets.text: @_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency Your opening paragraph is a complete fabrication of the facts. The application for the incinerator was made by Endless Energy (a private company with no connection to the council). The Council are the local planning authority who have to follow guidelines set by your government.

Today, we have hit our target of protecting more than 300,000 homes nationally from the risk of #flooding & coastal erosion! 

Here are our local flood risk managers to explain what we have achieved in the #NorthWest & what we will do to protect communities in the next 6 years https://t.co/mNV3dnmPfJ
@Mollster14 @_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency ... or Burley-in-Wharfedale.  It could go next to those 500 houses the Tory government approved on greenbelt land ü§î

@jamesrgrinter @EnvAgencySE Can you give me a more specific location I‚Äôm not familiar with the Lee navigation and I‚Äôll check for you.
Most canals are exempt from the close season (however there can be stretched within that are not, such as royal military canal).

@DunkinWedd @RosieP4 @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey @MonicaHone @greenarteries When I suggested @BraintreeDC put a policy into Local Plan in 2015, to fit 20% of calculated power use in major developments with renewable power at build, it was thought "risky".. glad I did. It's in there, just need to get Part 2 done!

The stench from the landfill 2 miles away is again seeping through the vents in my house. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Please, please, please put a stop to this living hell!! @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

@StinkStopthe @Sotlive Unbelievable, you are aware locally of @RedIndustries2 mismanagement of Walleys Landfill? The stench that is out of control!No mention of their significant permit breaches? The stink? The health issues? The @EnvAgencyMids monitoring? The complaints from @UHNM_NHS ? #stopthestink

I really don't understand why @EnvAgencyMids find it so difficult to substantiate the odour from #WalleysLandfill, wind is from the SW and lo and behold it stinks on Silverdale Road and beyond to the NE. Do you need some help? #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA
@JoeFishingEA @EnvAgencySE Always wondered, what‚Äôs the situation on the Lee Navigation, does it have a close season?

tweets.text:
It's hoped over 300,000 homes across the country are now better protected from flooding as the @EnvAgency announces the completion of its ¬£2.6bn defence scheme.

That includes over 400 homes in Croston #Lancashire thanks to a flood storage basin on the River Yarrow... https://t.co/U6QZpiFxno

@__Nobby @_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency So he's blaming Bradford Council for the Environment Agency decision????
And
What is standing up in Parl and rambling on about it going to achieve, nobody there cares.
Is there a plan for where it should go or is it just NIMBY.

The ‚Äòtoe‚Äô part of a riverbank is the bit most affected by flowing water and, therefore, erosion.

We‚Äôre in Wainfleet installing anti-erosion measures to protect this most vulnerable part of the Steeping River.

It‚Äôs all part of efforts by Steeping partners to reduce flood risk. https://t.co/oM6FseHnM3

Would like to share that today is ‚ÄòNational Drainage Misconnection Day‚Äô, helping to raise awareness on how drainage misconnections from properties can impact on local rivers, stream and beaches causing environmental damage. #NationalDrainageMisconnectionDay https://t.co/K6pxIIlkBR

#NationalDrainageMisconnectionsDay
NOV 2017 - Single dwelling septic tank discharge pipe demonstrating what can happen when surface/groundwater drainage pipes are  connected to a sewage system.

How much sediment was flushed out incorrectly until the problem was fully fixed? https://t.co/Sb81BIAMLn

The River Len at Palace Avenue, Maidstone choked by litter & fly-tipping. Though this wet dump is unsightly, it is invisible pollutants & man-made barriers (such as culverts and weirs) that inflict most harm on wildlife.üêü@rivercide_live @KeepBritainTidy @EnvAgency @maidstonebc https://t.co/wMLheOxBoj
